author: turtlestack
title: Great flavor set
review:
I bought this set because I wanted to add some color and flair to my growing LEGO Arctic (2014) collection, specially for the 60036: Arctic Base Camp. And though this is a simple set, it feels just right - the tree looks very good with lots of detail and color ornaments, and the addition of a few presents and even a very nice toy train make this a very charming little set.

On its own this would look nice on an office desk or bookcase, but when incorporated with some LEGO sets that have a winter theme (LEGO Arctic, and LEGO Winter Village) then this tree fits right in and adds some extra fun detail. 

This is easily the best polybag set I've ever purchased. Recommended!
